text:
ChatGPT 'Canvas' is live (and no one knows).

But you'll never use ChatGPT the same way:

1. Select Canvas at the bottom right (three dots).
2. Ask ChatGPT for a piece of code or text like before.
3. But now... you can now edit your end result!

→ Add emojis.
→ Make it longer. Make it shorter.
→ Edit one specific part (with a prompt).
→ Change reading levels (Kid → Graduate).
→ Polish the entire text / Ask for a code review.

The ability to edit ONLY parts of the output is wild.

It probably killed 1,000+ SaaS in one go:
☑ All-purpose content generators.
☑ Cursor AI for coding.
☑ GPT-wrappers.
